document_data.name: ''Incantations of the Dragon Queen''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Incantations of the Dragon Queen''''' was an especially rare [[tome]] that held much esoteric knowledge regarding the Dragon Queen [[Tiamat]]. It was highly prized by the second iteration of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] that emerged during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Anyone that was brave enough to read from the book could hope to gain a portion of the power described within.
document_data.History: As of the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} the tome could be found within [[Tiamat's temple]], the Dragon Queen's fortress that arose from [[Avernus]] in the [[Nine Hells]] to the [[Well of Dragons]] in the [[Backlands]] of [[Faer√ªn]].
